Package json.protocol

Interface ClientMessageAction<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AliveBody, BuyUpgradeBody, ChooseRegisterBody, HelloServerBody, MapSelectedBody, PlayCardBody, PlayerValuesBody, RebootDirectionBody, ReturnCardsBody, SelectedCardBody, SelectedDamageBody, SendChatBody, SetStartingPointBody, SetStatusBody
public interface ClientMessageAction<T>
This interface is implemented by each class in json.protocol that represents the message body. It only demands a function to be implemented that contains all the logic that should happen when a message with the respective message body was received by either the client or the server.
Author:
Mohamad, Viktoria
